twoSetSkill.name: Battle Rhythm 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Within a 10s interval after using any active weapon skill, the next weapon active skill gains 20% Total DMG Multiplier. DMG boost stacks up to 5 times. Adding a stack resets the effect's duration.

threeSetSkill.name: Hero Mode 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: After using 6 weapon skills, enter Hero Mode that lasts 20s (CD: 60s), gaining 70% Physical DMG, 25% Attack Speed and Move Speed, and immunity to most debuffs.
